## fragUV variable

Computes UV coord in \[0..1\] interval from given `fragCoord` and screen `res`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fragUV: (fragCoord: Vec4Term, res: Vec2Term) => import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").Op2<"vec2">
```
